TextEng: I will leave now.
You have a wife?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You have a really beautiful voice. I was drawn here by it.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 목소리가 정말 아름다워. 그 소리에 이끌려 왔어.

TextEng: I want to ask you some questions.
That's all my questions.
Have you had troubles with kobolds?
Why do you want a wife?
Why don't you find someone more your size?
Text: 왜 비슷한 크기인 사람을 안 찾아?

TextEng: Why are you called Rumgut?
I like to drink too. Why, I bet I can drink more than you!
Text: 나도 술 좋아해. 내가 너보다 더 많이 마실 수 있을 거야!

TextEng: I changed my mind. I do not think I can out drink you.
Text: 마음 바꿨어. 너보다 많이 못 마실 것 같아.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Pretend to drink, but spill most on ground.]</Start>
Time to die, Rumgut!
I guess you can lock me up.
<StartAction>[Drink the flask of rum.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Pretend to drink, but spill most on ground.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Drink the flask of rum.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Pretend to drink, but spill most on ground.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Drink the flask of rum.]</Start>
Could I speak to your wife?
I am here to save Becka.
Let her go, or I will have to kill you.
Sounds like you will be a great couple.
Text: 정말 좋은 커플이 될 것 같네.

TextEng: Listen stupid. She is a dwarf, which means she will never get bigger.
Text: 들어봐 멍청아. 베카는 드워프야, 절대 더 안 커.

TextEng: But she is a dwarf.
You are a giant, idiot!
You are an idiot, giant!
No, that is as big as she gets.
But you are a giant, she's not!
For someone so big, you sure have a small brain.
It would look better if I sliced it open.
Text: 내가 갈라 놓으면 더 멋있어 보일 거야.

TextEng: No, it makes you look as stupid as you really are.
Text: 아니, 실제로 얼마나 멍청한지 보여주는 것 같은데.

TextEng: Uh... sure.
It is very impressive.
I am fully grown.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You have to trust me. She will never be a proper wife.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 날 믿어야 해. 제대로 된 아내가 절대 못 돼.

TextEng: Oh, forget it!
